algorithm_technique: Convert arrays to sets for O(1) average time lookups, then iterate and count matches.
problem_summary_simple: Count how many elements in each array exist in the other array.
problem_summary_technical: Uses sets for efficient membership testing to count elements from nums1 present in nums2 and vice-versa.
key_insights: Sets provide O(1) average time complexity for checking element existence.
Iterating through one array and checking against the set of the other is efficient.
The problem requires counting occurrences based on indices, not just unique elements.
